biotools.summary: TElocal is a tool that utilizes both uniquely and ambiguously mapped reads to quantify transposable element expression at the locus level. TElocal takes RNA-seq (and similar data) and annotates reads to both genes & transposable elements.

bioschemas.name: TElocal
